categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: Plo Smarx was a scientist working for Hydrospeare Corporation.
The leader of Design Team Beta, Dr. Smarx worked in several projects to develop aquatic military technology for the Galactic Empire.
In 1 ABY, Dr. Smarx was arrested, accused of sedition and espionage. Dr. Tolum Harous replaced Smarx as leader of Design Team Beta.
